## MScroll variable

自动滚动 interval：AnimationFrame 时间间隔，单位毫秒

**Signature:**

```typescript
_default: import('vue').DefineComponent<
  {
    interval: {
      type: NumberConstructor
      required: false
      default: number
    }
  },
  {
    eleId: string
    startScroll: () => void
    stopScroll: () => void
  },
  unknown,
  {},
  {},
  import('vue').ComponentOptionsMixin,
  import('vue').ComponentOptionsMixin,
  {},
  string,
  import('vue').VNodeProps &
    import('vue').AllowedComponentProps &
    import('vue').ComponentCustomProps,
  Readonly<
    import('vue').ExtractPropTypes<{
      interval: {
        type: NumberConstructor
        required: false
        default: number
      }
    }>
  >,
  {
    interval: number
  },
  {}
>
```

## Example

```html
<m-scroll :interval="100"> {{ someText }} </m-scroll>
```
